item.title: Some Other Visualizations
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Goals for this week Some more data visualization Other forms of ‘experiencing’ data Listen 7th episode of the podcast Do Make a new notebook (or modify an existing one) to load data from the Datasette you pushed to Heroku. Visualize the provenance of your data using Leaflet (SG memo: Rachel Opitz workbooks) Or go for something complete different; try out some sonification on your data I don’t expect you to do these on your own in splendid isolation; I also don’t expect that everyone will complete them.
